Key.Info: Для Альфа без привязки к пользователю

Param.Name: From
Param.Caption: C
Param.Default: Select Sysdate-10 As ID from dual

Param.Name: To
Param.Caption: По
Param.Default: Select Sysdate As ID from dual

Params.Param: Select '-1' ID, 'Все модели' As TXT From dual union Select '1', 'Ford Galaxy' From dual union Select '2', 'Ford Fusion' From dual union Select '3', 'Dewo Matiz' From dual union Select '4', 'Иж Ода' From dual

Param.Name: Month
Param.Caption: Месяц
Param.Default: Select '= To_Char(D,''''DD.MM.YYYY'''')' As ID from dual

Params.Param: Select '01.01.2015' AS ID, 'Январь' AS TXT from dual union Select '01.02.2015' AS ID, 'Февраль' AS TXT from dual union Select '01.03.2015' AS ID, 'Март' AS TXT from dual

Workflows.Workflow: Select 'with T As (Select 1 ID, To_Date(''01.01.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') D, 4 As MODEL_ID, ''Иж Ода'' As MODEL_TXT From dual union Select 2, To_Date(''01.02.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY''), 2, ''Ford Fusion'' From dual union Select 3, To_Date(''01.03.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY''), 1, ''Ford Galaxy'' From dual union Select 4, To_Date(''01.03.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY''), 3, ''Dewo Matiz'' From dual) Select * From T Where D between To_Date(''@From'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') and To_Date(''@To'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') and MODEL_ID=Case When @Product=''-1'' Then MODEL_ID Else @Product end and To_Char(D,''DD.MM.YYYY'') @Month' As QUERY, '@CurrentFolder\Export\My_Prod_chcp866.txt' As FILE_PATH, '\t' As COL_SPAN, '\r\n' As ROW_SPAN From dual

Select 'Select 1 ID, ''Ford Galaxy'' As MODEL From dual union Select 2, ''Ford Fusion'' From dual union Select 3, ''Dewo Matiz'' From dual union Select 4, ''Иж Ода'' From dual' As QUERY, 'Product' As LIST_NAME, '@CurrentFolder\Export\Product.txt' As FILE_PATH From Dual union Select 'Select 1 ID, To_Date(''01.01.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') D, 4 As MODEL From dual union Select 2, To_Date(''01.02.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY''), 2 From dual union Select 3, To_Date(''01.03.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY''), 1 From dual union Select 4, To_Date(''01.03.2015'',''DD.MM.YYYY''), 3 From dual', 'Journal' As LIST_NAME, '@CurrentFolder\Export\Journal.txt' From Dual
